content.raw:
thanks nate!
gazebo_models pull request 10 needs to be merged along with this in order to have a proper cordless drill. With the fixed cordless drill model you also need to change its z position in qual world 2, otherwise it's penetrating the desk.

The box for the robot to sit on is missing?
content.html:
thanks nate! gazebo_models pull request 10 needs to be merged along with this in order to have a proper cordless drill. With the fixed cordless drill model you also need to change its z position in qual world 2, otherwise it's penetrating the desk.

The box for the robot to sit on is missing?
